Package ch.nolix.core.communicationAPI

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IGenericReceiver<M>
    A IGenericReceiver can receive messages of a certain type.
    IGenericReplier<M,R>
    A IGenericReplier can reply to messages of a certain type.
    IGenericReplyingSender<M,R>
    A IGenericReplyingSender can send messages of a certain type and return replies to the messages.
    IGenericSender<M>
    A IGenericSender can send messages of a certain type.
    IReceiver
    A IReceiver can receive messages.
    IReplier
    A IReplier can reply to messages.
    IReplyingSender
    A IReplyingSender can send messages and return replies to the messages.
    ISender
    A Sender can send messages.
